pullrequest.title: Defer starting the worker process until _initialise_worker

content.raw: I may also change zprocess to use a semaphore to limit the number of simultaneous subprocess creations-in-progress to the number of CPU cores. This will reduce context switching and speed things up a bit, and will make the time for each process to start up less variable.
content.html: I may also change zprocess to use a semaphore to limit the number of simultaneous subprocess creations-in-progress to the number of CPU cores. This will reduce context switching and speed things up a bit, and will make the time for each process to start up less variable.
